author: Aria Bendix
title: I reported on the coronavirus for 3 months — then I got it. Here's what my battle with COVID-19 has been like.
description: I've been reporting on the coronavirus pandemic for Business Insider since early January. Two weeks ago, I started feeling mild symptoms: body aches and chills. A week later, I had trouble finishing a sentence without gasping for air. Two doctors told me I ha…
content: If I've learned one thing from covering the coronavirus pandemic for nearly three months, it's to prepare for the worst. When New York state announced its first case on March 1, I immediately purchased two weeks' worth of toilet paper, disinfectant wipes, foo… [+7426 chars]
